title.rendered: Buy Minecraft without Paypal and credit card

content.rendered:
You can also buy Minecraft without a Paypal account or a credit card. This is of particular interest to under-18s who are not allowed to have a Paypal account or a credit card. Here we explain how to do it.

Buy Minecraft via Sofortüberweisung.de, giropay or by direct debit

If you don’t have a credit card, PayPal account, or are too young to use these services, there are other ways to pay for Minecraft.

  1. Open the Minecraft website.
  2. If you don’t already have a Mojang account, click Register in the top right.
  3. Enter your contact details here. You must provide your email address, name and date of birth, set a password for your account and answer the three security questions. Then click on the green “Register” button.
  4. You will receive a confirmation email with a link that you must open. Now your Mojang account is activated, you can proceed to purchase Minecraft.
  5. Now visit the Minecraft start page again and click on the orange “Buy Now!” button on the right.
  6. On the next page, click “Buy Minecraft for this account” in the top left.
  7. Now all you have to do is enter your address.
  8. Further down the page you can now select your payment method. If you don’t want to pay by credit card or PayPal, you can open up other, hidden payment options with a simple click. To do this, click on the red “Show more payment methods” link at the bottom of the page.
  9. A list of various providers opens. The following three offers can be used by every German buyer (see picture). Either you transfer the amount directly via the Sofortüberweisung.de service or giropay, or you use the direct debit procedure.
  10. Now select the desired payment option and click on the green button at the bottom right.
  11. Now follow the further instructions on the page. Once you have completed the payment process, you will receive an email with the activation code and the link to download Minecraft. You can now install Minecraft on your PC.

Alternative: Get a free credit card

Credit cards don’t have to be expensive. Many banks, e.g. Wüstenrot, also offer free credit cards for checking accounts. If you don’t want to open a new account, you can get a Visa credit card from the Barclaycard without switching accounts – also free of charge, of course.
